lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama awarded the nation's highest civilian honor to 21 groundbreaking actors, musicians, athletes and innovators who inspired him over the years and "helped make me who I am."

headline.main: Top US Civilian Honor Goes to 21 Artists, Athletes, Others
headline.print_headline: Top US Civilian Honor Goes to 21 Artists, Athletes, Others
